subtitulo: In case of banning, persistent failures with ban messages that compromise navigation.
subtitulo2: **We treat banned users with the respect they deserve**. We do not tolerate cheats or any form of unfair advantage. Our system rarely makes mistakes in detecting such actions, and the ban is final.n/n/If you believe the punishment was a mistake and wish to appeal, contact support. We will review your case and listen to your side, **except in clear cases of cheating**.
